attributes.action: stop deducting pensions from MPGS soldiers pay and pension awards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is a travesty that soldiers who are awarded a pension after 22 years service are FORCED to pay this back if they rejoin on a different contract that prevents them from bettering themselves unless they hand the pension back. these OLD soldiers are valuable assetts and should not be penalised due to loyalty and NO other jobs to go to
